creator: phonpitsanu@gmail.com
text:
Hello,

At my system webserver(Apache) connect to call web application(IBM Webshperer)  when web application  down. normal case will show page < 500 Internal Server Error>   "Internal Server Error" But why sometime when web service down show page < 500 Internal Server Error> "The server made a boo boo." 

i confirm i have already commnet that line.  please help me solve this issue why The server made a boo boo. still show  thank you.

==============================
This my config   httpd.conf
==============================
# Customizable error responses come in three flavors:
# 1) plain text 2) local redirects 3) external redirects
#
# Some examples:
#ErrorDocument 500 "The server made a boo boo."
#ErrorDocument 404 /missing.html
#ErrorDocument 404 "/cgi-bin/missing_handler.pl"
#ErrorDocument 402 http://www.example.com/subscription_info.html

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: Bugzilla is for reporting bugs and no user support forum. Please post your question to users@apache.org
